title: Video: Perfume Genius – Hood
body:
With his sophomore record release just around the corner, **Perfume Genius** has unveiled a slightly bizarre but hugely sensual video featuring new track _Hood_.

More upbeat than previous work, the track is one of longing and lust, playing to **Hadreas’s** vocal strengths. The video is a statement of sorts, questioning the moral compass of society when it comes to same sex relationships, showing **Hadreas** in ‘romantic’ positions with another male (gay port star **Arpad Miklos**). As he himself excellently summarized in a recent interview with [Pitchfork](http://pitchfork.com/news/45133-video-perfume-genius-hood/), _“If I just got my boyfriend to be in there with me, people could just pass it off as cute because we’re both boyish. I like the idea of not having things be so obvious.”_ In an age when it appears that almost anything goes with regards to heterosexual music videos (see **Rihanna’s** x-rated romps), it’s refreshing to witness an artist challenging these out-dated traditions. Check out the video for _Hood_ below.
